description: Enjoy this twist on a Turkish pide that uses beef sausage on a tangy tomato base. This quick and easy dinner recipe is sure to become a regular.
keywords: Sausage dishes,Sausage,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Budget,Beef,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Mar 2021,Autumn,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Cheat's Beef Sausage Pides Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 600g beef, herb & garlic sausages, casings removed and discarded, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 250°C/230°C fan-forced. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook sausage, breaking up with a wooden spoon, for 5 minutes or until well browned. Add tomato paste and cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant. Season with pepper and remove from heat.

Divide each dough ball in half. Roll out 1 portion on a floured surface to make a 15 x 20cm oval. Top with one-quarter of the sausage mixture. Fold up sides, and twist to seal ends together. Place on tray. Repeat with remaining dough portions and filling.
Bake, swapping trays between oven racks halfway through cooking, for 15 minutes or until dough is golden brown. Cool for 5 minutes.
Combine yoghurt and mint in a bowl. Season with pepper. Dollop minted yoghurt over pides, top with spinach and serve with lemon wedges.
